DIA_Refugee_QM304_04_Flee_03_01: Damn, there's too many guards here!
DIA_Refugee_QM304_04_Why_03_02: Me? I don't... ah, well, I'm stressed about what's in my pocket. Seems like all the royalists are crazy about it right now.
DIA_Refugee_QM304_04_Why_03_04: Yeah, how do you know? Anyway, never mind, just take it, I'll go look for an honest job in the meantime!
DIA_Refugee_QM304_04_Why_15_05: Wait a minute. Do you know where your carrier got the ore?
DIA_Refugee_QM304_04_Why_03_06: No, I don't know, I'm sorry. Goodbye!
